name: Greetings From Krampus
description:
Off Leash Entertainment is a two man team who wanted to make a silly and fun VR game for people to enjoy. We named our company for our two dogs, who are living their best life when they're off leash!

Welcome to Krampus is in active development, and we are currently working to fix bugs and adding additional content. We’ll keep you informed of any updates and improvements as we go. Thank you for playing, and we look forward to seeing your creations!
